# UITextSpellCheckingType.default

**Case**

Specifies the default spell-checking behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

The default behavior is to enable spell-checking whenever autocorrection is also enabled.

## Constants

- **UITextSpellCheckingType.no**: Disables spell-checking behavior.
- **UITextSpellCheckingType.yes**: Enables spell-checking behavior.
title: UITextSpellCheckingType.default
